sourcesContent:
import * as Yup from 'yup'

export const EmployeeValidation = Yup.object().shape({
    fullName: Yup.string()
      .min(2,'too Short!')
      .required('Required'),
    preferredName: Yup.string(),
    birthDate: Yup.date()
      .required('Required'),
    currentStreet1: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    currentCity: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    currentAddressProof: Yup.required('Required'),
    permanentStreet1: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    permanentCity: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    permanentAddressProof: Yup.required('Required'),
      employeeInformation:{
        fullName:'',
        preferredName:'',
        birthDate:'',
        gender:'',
        maritalStatus:''
    },
    currentAddress:{
        street1:'',
        street2:'',
        city:'',
        state:'',
        country:'',
        addressProof:''
    },
    permanentAddress:{
        street1:'',
        street2:'',
        city:'',
        state:'',
        country:'',
        addressProof:''
    },
    emergencyContact:{
        name1:'',
        mobile1:'',
        relationship1:'',
        name2:'',
        mobile2:'',
        relationship2:''
    },
    jobDetails:{
        hiredate:'',
        salary:'',
        currentsalary:'',
        bond:''
    },
    idProof:{
        idProof:''
    },
    employeePicture:{
        picture:''
    },
    feedback:{
        feedback:''
    }    
     
  });
